title: Virtual Reality-Based Surgical Teamwork Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Operating Room Protocols and Medical Team Roles
context.additional_context: Scenario where medical professionals train surgical teamwork using virtual reality on personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Six core microskills (briefing, debriefing, cross-monitoring, etc.) can be applied to actual surgical scenarios
Team-based communication skills (call-outs, check-backs, 2-challenge rule) are performed with 90% accuracy in virtual reality environments
The I'M SAFE checklist is used to verify 100% of pre-operative patient safety conditions

resources: 360-Degree Virtual Reality Headset (e.g., HTC Vive Pro)
4 Types of Surgical Scenario Content in H.265 360-Video Format

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
